name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2
description: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2 is coming to PSVR 2 sometime later in 2023. The original Help Wanted was first a VR title, before coming out on consoles. It featured minigames starring characters and locations from the Five Nights series. The new game will bring new minigames, locations, story, and animatronics.
